description: Irregular triangle read by rows: row n >= 1 contains the sequence p(n), s(p(n)), p(s(p(n))), p(p(s(p(n)))), s(p(p(s(p(n))))), ..., repeatedly applying (p,s,p) to n, where p = phi (A000010), s = sigma = (A000203), stopping after the first 1 is reached. If 1 is never reached, row n contains -1.
